about.title: About me
about.intro: Hello! I'm <bold>Leandro</bold>, a backend developer passionate about creating clean, efficient, and scalable solutions. I specialize in <bold>Laravel/Lumen</bold>, <bold>FastAPI</bold>, and <bold>NestJS</bold>, technologies that I enjoy because of their flexibility and robustness when designing APIs and backend systems well-structured.
about.extra: In addition to my daily work, I enjoy solving programming challenges on platforms like <bold>Codewars</bold> and <bold>LeetCode</bold>, where I can improve my algorithms and data structures skills. I also love <bold>chess</bold>, <bold>math</bold>, and everything that implies <bold>logical thinking</bold>.
about.project-description: This site is a collection of my backend projects with a designed interface to easily interact with them. All the code is built with good practices, and I try to focus on quality and detail.
